definition: Huang Guangyu (1969-), PRC entrepreneur and millionaire, founder of GOME Electrical 國美電器|国美电器[Guo2 mei3 Dian4 qi4]

sentences.english: Huang Guangyu, who founded Gome Electrical Appliances and owns unlisted property businesses, sank to 17th place from the top position he held last year.
sentences.chinese: 成立國美電器的黃光裕，已從首富跌至17名。

sentences.english: Of course, the risk Mr. Huang represents comes with the emerging-markets territory.
sentences.chinese: 黃光裕給貝恩帶來的風險無疑是新興市場特有的。

sentences.english: Mr. Huang, once China's richest man, is known for rocking the boat.
sentences.chinese: 曾一度是中國首富的黃光裕是出了名的不安分人物。

sentences.english: Wong Kwong Yu about how to start their own has been a closely-guarded secret.
sentences.chinese: 黃光裕對於自己如何起家，一直諱莫如深。

sentences.english: The electricals retailer was founded by Huang Guangyu, an entrepreneur who was once China's richest man.
sentences.chinese: 這家電器零售商由黃光裕創立，他曾經是中國首富。

sentences.english: Driven by money and fame, Huang Guangyu controlled some stock shares by illegal means.
sentences.chinese: 因爲受到名利驅使，黃光裕非法操控了部分股票。

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Ji2 tuan2
Guo2 jia1 Dian4 wang3 Gong1 si1
Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: to have exclusive selling rights/to be the sole agent for a production unit or firm

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Nong2 ye4 Yin2 hang2
